New Records: Zambia have not won the AFCON since 2012, a significant milestone
Key Match Events: Tanzania's coach was suspended and fined, and a player was sent off
Pre-Game Insights: Zambia aims to end a winless run in AFCON since 2012; Tanzania struggles with form and coaching issues
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zambia has failed to score in only one of their last nine meetings with Tanzania; Tanzania hasn't scored more than one goal in their last 13 matches
